messages.TRMSG_PRE_BATTLE:
If I battle now, won’t it mess up my
usual pace?
messages.TRMSG_POST_BATTLE:
Sticking to one’s own goal is more
important than it seems.If you match your goal with someone
else, you’ll lose your identity.
messages.TRMSG_NOT_MORNING_UNUSED:
Well, yes, sometimes I do walk.
I even stop on occasion.I am human, after all.
messages.TRMSG_REMATCH:
Up till now, I’d maintained my pace.
But seeing you threw me off!
